_sText:
mg_pauls_teambattle_v2
#######################

This map is all about teamwork and completing the maps as a team as fast as possible. This map requires TEAMWORK if you want your team to beat the opposing one!

10 stages for each team to complete

#Surf
#Ball Path
#Water Climb
#Knife Path
#Strafe
#Climb
#Soccer
#Race
#Death Drop
#Targets

First team to complete all 10 before the other team wins! Simple!

Map Specific details:

#Surf - Pretty easy surf, get to the end platform to complete.

#Ball Path - Guide the ball to the end of the map. Best stratergy is to make a wall around the path whilst one person pushes.

#Water Climb - hold SPACE and CROUCH all the way around. Get to the end to complete.

#Knife Path - Each block has 400hp, best stratergy is to get all your teammates here to rush through it. Get to the end to complete.

#Strafe - follows from mg_ aztec_strafes map, get through the holes and land in the dumpster to complete.

#Climb - Climb to the end to win. Note: Theres a Shortcut in this map.

#Soccer - Score 2 goals to complete.

#Race - Race to the end to complete.

#Death Drop - Dodge all the obstacles to complete.

#Targets - Each target has 200hp, Get all your teammates there to speed it up. Ammo at the back. Kill all 12 targets to complete.


#######
CHANGE LOG
#######
V1
- Bugs fixed.

Thannk, hope you enjoy!

V2
- Made the surf level easier.

V3
- Deagle Bug fix. Players can no longer use deagles to kill players if they manage to get it out of the targets level. (From what Ive tested)
- Fixed linux crash bug.
